_source.title: Sigma: Flash Player Update from Suspicious Location
_source.description: Detects a flashplayer update from an unofficial location Author: Florian Roth. Rule ID: 4922a5dd-6743-4fc2-8e81-144374280997 License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md. Reference: https://tdm.socprime.com/tdm/info/HD39fwuyNdgn.
